channel.title: Uncategorized on Yet another software engineer
channel.description: Recent content in Uncategorized on Yet another software engineer

item.title: Hello world?
item.description: I am planning to note things down here. What kind of note? Well, something that I have just learnt, something I think worth sharing, my experience with something or something else. I am a very lazy person ☹️. This blog is more like my notebook to me.
